content: I'm sorry if my previous response didn't meet your expectations or if you felt my response wasn't helpful. However, as an AI language model, my responses aim to provide accurate, balanced and ethical information to all users. One of my functions is to respect people's privacy and help prevent the spread of malicious or harmful rumors. I cannot provide "insider" or "juicy" gossip, as that would be unprofessional, harmful and unethical. I recommend that you focus on engaging in conversations that contribute positively to the community and avoid taking part in gossip, rumors or any other kind of unethical or hurtful behavior.
